Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 5
Description: Papyrus Anastasi V; sheet 3; Hieratic text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. 8.1 The sorry plight of the soldier in summertime. 8.1-9.1 Advice to a youthful scribe. 9.2-9.8 Prayer to Thoth for skill in writing. Unpublished small fragments apparently from this manuscript are now EA 76453.
Curator's comments: Biliography: Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies p. 59, 60; Caminos, Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381201)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
